p: People living in or traveling to areas with risk for YFV transmission should avoid mosquito bites whenever possible [ 69]. Those who get YF should avoid mosquito bites for five days after fever onset to avoid infecting naive mosquitoes that can then transmit YFV to others. Persons â‰¥9 months old living in or traveling to areas with risk for YFV transmission should be vaccinated unless they have a contraindication to vaccination with a live-attenuated vaccine.
